title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - Updated
description: Gather and document the functional and non-functional requirements for the VoiceCommerceIntegrator system. This includes supported smart home devices (e.g., Amazon Echo, Google Home), virtual assistants (e.g., Alexa, Google Assistant), e-commerce platforms (e.g., Amazon, eBay, AliExpress), integration methods (REST APIs, Webhooks, SDKs where applicable), user authentication and authorization (OAuth2.0), data privacy and security considerations (GDPR, PCI-DSS, CCPA), scalability and performance requirements, error handling mechanisms, localization and internationalization aspects, accessibility for users with disabilities (WCAG 2.1 guidelines), and any other relevant aspects such as testing strategies, documentation standards, version control, and code quality best practices.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, interfaces, and data flow, considering scalability, security, and performance requirements.

title: Develop Voice Integration Module
description: Implement the voice integration module to handle voice commands, natural language processing, and communication with smart home devices and virtual assistants.

title: Develop E-Commerce Integration Module
description: Implement the e-commerce integration module to handle product catalogs, shopping carts, and order processing with various e-commerce platforms.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for managing settings, preferences, and monitoring the system's status.

title: Set up Development Environment
description: Configure the development environment, including version control, continuous integration, and deployment pipelines.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures, such as authentication, authorization, data encryption, and secure communication protocols, to ensure the system's security and user privacy.

title: Design Database Schema
description: Design the database schema to store user data, preferences, order history, and other relevant information.

title: Develop Test Suite
description: Develop a comprehensive test suite, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure the system's functionality and reliability.

title: Write Documentation
description: Prepare technical documentation, user guides, and deployment instructions for the VoiceCommerceIntegrator system.
